frame.name: Activity_pause
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> pauses in the course of an <fen>Activity</fen>. <ex></ex> <ex><fex name="Agent">The government</fex> <t>froze</t> <fex name="Activity">settlement construction</fex> <fex name="Time">in 1992</fex> <fex name="Purpose">to facilitate peace talks</fex>.</ex>
<ex>The lifting of the <fex name="Activity">nuclear</fex> <t>freeze</t> was deemed necessary to generate needed electricity.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Activity
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Activity</fen> for which an <fen>Agent</fen> is pausing.</def-root>

FE.name: Agent
FE.definition: <def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> pauses in the course of an <fen>Activity</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Manner</fen> in which an <fen>Agent</fen> pauses during the course of an <fen>Activity</fen>. </def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Means</fen> by which an <fen>Agent</fen> pauses in the course of an <fen>Activity</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where an <fen>Agent</fen> pauses in the course of an <fen>Activity</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Time</fen> at which an <fen>Agent</fen> pauses in the course of an <fen>Activity</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Purpose</fen> for which an <fen>Agent</fen> pauses in the course of an <fen>Activity</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Depictive
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE is used for the <fen>Depictive</fen> phrase describing the actor or undergoer of an action.</def-root>

FE.name: Completeness
FE.definition: <def-root>The extent to which the <fen>Agent</fen> pauses in the <fen>Activity</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Duration
FE.definition: <def-root>The length of time of the pause in the <fen>Activity</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Legal_basis
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE describes the legal basis or precedent by which the <fen>Agent</fen> pauses the <fen>Activity</fen>.
<ex>The negotiations have been <t>frozen</t> <fex name="Legal_basis">under the Act of 2004</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Explanation</fen> denotes a proposition from which the main clause (headed by the target) logically follows. This often means that the <fen>Explanation</fen> causes the target's proposition, but not in all cases. </def-root>

lexUnit.name: pause.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a temporary stop in action or speech.

lexUnit.name: freeze.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: keep or stop at a fixed level or in a fixed state.

lexUnit.name: moratorium.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a temporary prohibition of an activity.

lexUnit.name: adjourn.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to suspend for a period of time
